name: reg_jacobian
author: NiftyReg Developers
description: Tool to compute the Jacobian determinant map from a deformation field or control point lattice.

inputs.name: Deformation Field
inputs.description: Filename of the deformation field (from reg_transform)

inputs.name: Control Point Lattice
inputs.description: Filename of the control point position lattice (from reg_f3d)

inputs.name: Jacobian Determinant Map
inputs.description: Filename of the Jacobian determinant map

inputs.name: Jacobian Matrix Map
inputs.description: Filename of the Jacobian matrix map (9 or 4 values stored as a 5D nifti)

inputs.name: Log of the Jacobian Determinant Map
inputs.description: Filename of the Log of the Jacobian determinant map

inputs.name: Affine Matrix
inputs.description: Filename of the affine matrix to modulate the Jacobian determinant map

output-files.name: Jacobian Determinant Map
output-files.description: File containing the Jacobian determinant map

output-files.name: Jacobian Matrix Map
output-files.description: File containing the Jacobian matrix map

output-files.name: Log of the Jacobian Determinant Map
output-files.description: File containing the log of the Jacobian determinant map
